data.bonus

Class BonusQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.bonus.BonusQuestion
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultipleChoice, ShortAnswer

    public class BonusQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
    BonusQuestion is the class that will deal with the numerous bonus questions that users can answer at their leisure during the competition.
    Author:
    Graem Littleton, Kevin Brightwell, Jonathan Demelo, Ramesh Raj, Justin McDonald

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean active 
      protected java.lang.String answer 
      protected java.lang.String prompt 
      protected int type 
      static int TYPE_MULTI
      Used to show a question is a multiple choice question.
      static int TYPE_SHORT
      Used to show a question is a short answer question.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BonusQuestion() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkAnswer(java.lang.String test)
      Checks whether an answer is correct against a stored value.
      java.lang.String getAnswer()
      getAnswer is to be implemented by both the ShortAnswer and MultipleChoice classes.
      int getType()
      getType returns the type of question that is to be asked, which can be either multiple choice of short answer.
      boolean isActive()
      isActive returns true if the user is still able to answer a specific bonus question.
      void setActive(boolean active)
      Sets the active state to the value passed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BonusQuestion

        public BonusQuestion()

    • Method Detail

      • getAnswer

        public java.lang.String getAnswer()
        getAnswer is to be implemented by both the ShortAnswer and MultipleChoice classes. It will return the correct answer to the Admin when a User has attempted to answer a question.

      • getType

        public int getType()
        getType returns the type of question that is to be asked, which can be either multiple choice of short answer.
        Returns:
        this.type

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        isActive returns true if the user is still able to answer a specific bonus question.
        Returns:
        this.active

      • setActive

        public void setActive(boolean active)
        Sets the active state to the value passed.
        Parameters:
        active - The new state of the question.

      • checkAnswer

        public boolean checkAnswer(java.lang.String test)
        Checks whether an answer is correct against a stored value. Does this case insensitively.
        Parameters:
        test - The answer to test with.
        Returns:
        True if correct.
